item.title: Dave Rodgers - Space Boy
item.description:
Everynight
you light me
with your
gasoline
Everytime
I feel delight
when you
recall my name
So you can be my
shining star tonite
I’m not alone
with all your love
Fly across the sky
you will be mine
Like a real dream
with you babe
Gonna get you like a
space boy
(Wow wow wow wow)
I’m ready babe
Gonna catch you
I’m your space boy
Dive in to
your heart baby
Gonna get you like a
space boy
(Wow wow wow wow)
I’ll give you my love
Gonna catch you
I’m your space boy
Take a chance
with me baby

Everynight you drive
me crazy as you know
Everyday
I scream so loud
you’ll always
be my queen
So you can be my
shining star tonite
I’m not alone
with all your love
Fly across the sky
you will be mine
Like a real dream
with you babe
Gonna get you like a
space boy

Gonna catch you
I’m your space boy
